title: Chicken Stir Fry
tagline: Tender chicken, crisp vegetables, savory sauce
description: Chicken Stir Fry - Kenji López-Alt tested
steps: Toss chicken with 1 tbsp soy sauce, cornstarch, wine. Marinate 15 minutes.
Mix broth, remaining soy sauce, oyster sauce.
Heat wok over high until smoking. Add oil.
Sear chicken without stirring 1 minute, then stir-fry until just cooked. Transfer out.
Stir-fry garlic and ginger 30 seconds. Add vegetables, stir-fry 2 minutes.
Return chicken, add sauce. Cook until thickened.
Drizzle with sesame oil. Serve over rice.
notes: Cook in batches to avoid steaming.
